description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ttna","text":"This protocol describes how to visualise alpha-synuclein in STC-1 cells by DAB immunohistochemistry. It also works for other antibodies (e.g. 5-HT, CCK, GLP).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Alpha-synuclein immunochemistry on STC-1 cells using DAB
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3qt57","text":"Thaw frozen 24-well plates containing fixed cells grown on glass coverslips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
